Payments: This group encompasses all requests related to the movement of funds, including initiating transfers, making outbound payments, and confirming payment status.
Fees: This category includes requests concerning disputes, corrections, and amendments related to banking fees.
Account Information: This group contains requests for general account information and updates on account funding.
Loans: This group focuses solely on requests related to loan documentation.
Operations: This category includes requests related to the internal processing of transactions and operational procedures.
Account Management: This group contains requests for changes to account commitments or agreements.
